EmailTemplate.subject: Here’s an easier way to keep your software up to date
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Staying on top of the updates needed to ensure your ATM software runs smoothly and securely is a full-time job. And with resources tight and a long priority list for your team, there’s a simpler way to manage this crucial task. Shifting this responsibility to a third party IT expert who focuses exclusively on keeping your ATM software up to date means your IT team’s to-do list just got shorter. NCR’s Software Evergreen Service makes this possible.
